channel.title: Errors on Danni Scales

item.title: Prokka
item.description: I had real issues the first time I tried to install and run Prokka. I googled the error messages but none of the solutions posted online worked for me. In the end there was only one thing which worked so I’ve posted it here in the hope it helps someone else! Installing using brew First of all I tried installing Prokka using brew: brew install brewsci/bio/prokka but I got this error message:

item.title: Snippy
item.description: I had real issues trying to install and run Snippy the first time Installing using brew brew install brewsci/bio/snippy Installing using conda conda install -c conda-forge -c bioconda -c defaults snippy The solution conda environment
